message: Hi guys, Anibal CEO of InfluAds here. This is a bit of a promotion but also something that i believe is very relevant to some of you.
INFLUADS recently launched a crowd-sourced ad network where people can build their own networks. We always wanted to start one focusing on Python and Django only (the first of it kind).
Let me know if you are interested (anibal@influads.com) and feel free to check more at http://influads.com or join at http://influads.com/publishers

Would you be interested in joining? We need 10 or so interesting sites and we'll ask those publishers to start inviting others onboard, curating the quality onboard. When we reach a minimum size, we'll take care of sales and launch it officially.
